member.name: T:PongCoasterServerUI.App
member.summary: Provides application-specific behavior to supplement the default Application class.

member.name: M:PongCoasterServerUI.App.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the singleton application object. This is the first line of authored code executed, and as such is the logical equivalent of main() or WinMain().
member.remarks: If you're looking for App.xaml.cs, the file is present in each platform head of the solution.

member.name: P:PongCoasterServerUI.App.MainWindow
member.summary: Gets the main window of the app.

member.name: M:PongCoasterServerUI.App.OnLaunched(Microsoft.UI.Xaml.LaunchActivatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the application is launched normally by the end user. Other entry points will be used such as when the application is launched to open a specific file.
member.param: Details about the launch request and process.

member.name: M:PongCoasterServerUI.App.OnNavigationFailed(System.Object,Microsoft.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when Navigation to a certain page fails

member.name: M:PongCoasterServerUI.App.OnSuspending(System.Object,Windows.ApplicationModel.SuspendingEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when application execution is being suspended. Application state is saved without knowing whether the application will be terminated or resumed with the contents of memory still intact.
member.param: The source of the suspend request.

member.name: T:PongCoasterServerUI.MainPage
member.summary: An empty page that can be used on its own or navigated to within a Frame.

member.name: M:PongCoasterServerUI.MainPage.#ctor(System.IntPtr,Android.Runtime.JniHandleOwnership)
member.summary: Native constructor, do not use explicitly.
member.remarks: Used by the Xamarin Runtime to materialize native objects that may have been collected in the managed world.

member.name: T:PongCoasterServerUI.SettingsPage
member.summary: An empty page that can be used on its own or navigated to within a Frame.
